infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: $(PRODUCT_NAME) needs access to your Camera to take photos and scan QR codes.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to select photos for treatment progress tracking.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to microphone for video recording features.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to your location to provide location-based services.
